original_text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;
korean_text: 그리스도를 위하여 너희에게 은혜를 주신 것은 다만 그를 믿을 뿐 아니라 또한 그를 위하여 고난도 받게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: For unto you it is given
not only to believe on him
but also to suffer for his sake
